Package aor.fpbackend.dao

Class AbstractDao<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.dao.AbstractDao<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity for which this DAO is responsible.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssetDao, ConfigurationDao, GroupMessageDao, IndividualMessageDao, InterestDao, KeywordDao, LaboratoryDao, MethodDao, NotificationDao, ProjectAssetDao, ProjectDao, ProjectLogDao, ProjectMembershipDao, RoleDao, SessionDao, SkillDao, TaskDao, UserDao
public abstract class AbstractDao<T extends Serializable> extends Object implements Serializable
AbstractDao class provides a generic implementation of common database operations.

This abstract class defines standard CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) that can be extended by specific DAO implementations for different entity types. The class is annotated with TransactionAttribute to specify the transaction management behavior, ensuring that each method runs within a required transaction context.
